univ_sigma_univ:

@[simp]
theorem finset.univ_sigma_univ {α : Type _} {β : α → Type _} [fintype α] [∀ a, fintype (β a)] :
    ((univ : Finset α).sigma fun a => (univ : Finset (β a))) = univ :=
  rfl
#align finset.univ_sigma_univ finset.univ_sigma_univ
